alert.note: Alert for Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Valley County through 200 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elyria, or 8 miles west of Ord, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elyria and Fort Hartsuff State Park around 125 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
